title: Jim and Norma Null Scholarship Endowment
description: To support a merit- and need-based scholarship in honor of James Null to assist students majoring in political science at UCCS.  Preference is for students aspiring to continue their political science education at the graduate level.
marketingContent: To support a merit- and need-based scholarship in honor of James Null to assist students majoring in political science at UCCS.
